abstract: Always an art lover's paradise, Paris outdoes itself during the sprawling International Contemporary Art Fair, or FIAC, one of the world's grandest such events, which will be held this year from Oct. 20 to 23.
snippet: Always an art lover's paradise, Paris outdoes itself during the sprawling International Contemporary Art Fair, or FIAC, one of the world's grandest such events, which will be held this year from Oct. 20 to 23.

headline.main: Annual Art Fair Sprawls Across Paris
